sense.def:
To elicit a response or a reaction
pomeni storiti nekaj, na kar drugi odgovorijo ali se odzovejo.

seg.quote: Threats to reinstate the tax elicited jeers from the opposition.

sense.def:
To elicit a piece of information
pomeni dobiti podatek tako, da postavljamo previdna vprašanja.

seg.quote: In five minutes she had elicited all the Herriard family history.
